app_descript:
App Name: Anymoji
App Package Name: com.nxany.anymoji

Brief: Anymoji injects a dose of fun into your messaging and social media by bringing a collection of personalized 3D emojis to life, mirroring your facial expressions in real-time. With an array of cute animals, famous celebrity avatars, and the ability to involve multiple faces simultaneously, Anymoji takes the emoji experience to the next level. Enjoy the magical blend of technology and creativity, turning any conversation into an entertaining and engaging exchange.
